short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly manage and organize tabs with KeepTab Manager, making your browsing smooth and clutter-free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep Tabs Manager is the perfect tool to organize your browser and improve your productivity! With this extension, you can easily save all your open tabs in just one click and restore them later with a single click whenever you return. Whether you're working on multiple projects, studying, or managing personal tasks, Keep Tabs Manager keeps your browsing smooth and clutter-free, helping you stay focused and organized."  

✨ Features:  
- 🗂️ Save All Tabs: Store all your open tabs in one click and access them at any time.  
- 🔄 One-Click Restore: Instantly reopen all your saved tabs with a single click when you return to your browser.  
- 🔍 Quick Tab Search: Find specific tabs quickly, no matter how many tabs you have open.  
- 🧹 Declutter Your Browser: Keep your workspace tidy by saving tabs you’re not currently using and organizing them for later.  
- 📅 Organize Sessions: Manage your tabs by grouping them into different sessions for better organization.  

📈 Whether you’re a multitasker, student, or professional, Keep Tabs Manager simplifies your browsing and ensures you never lose track of your important tabs again. Download it today and enjoy a more efficient and organized browsing experience! 🎯
